FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

5G is the latest generation of mobile network technology, offering significantly faster speeds and lower latency than 4G. If you stream video, play mobile games, or work remotely, 5G will noticeably improve your experience.

Most phones from 2020 onwards support 5G. You can check your phone's compatibility on our website or in the Vouch Mobile app. If your phone doesn't support 5G, you'll still get great 4G LTE coverage.

Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's 5G network, which covers 200+ cities and is expanding rapidly. Check our coverage map to see 5G availability in your specific area.

No! 5G access is included in all our plans at no extra charge. Unlike some carriers, we don't charge a premium for 5G connectivity.

5G can be up to 10-100 times faster than 4G. In real-world usage, you can expect download speeds of 100-500 Mbps on 5G compared to 25-50 Mbps on 4G LTE.

Early 5G phones did have slightly higher battery usage, but modern 5G devices are optimized to manage power efficiently. Most users don't notice a significant difference.
